show.title: Ranching Reboot
show.summary: Rebooting your thinking about Farming, Ranching and Food production. Conversations in land stewardship with some of today's most innovative ranchers and producers. Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/ranching-reboot/support

title: Bonus #5 with Dominique "Domo" Woodham "All About Fire"
subtitle: Bonus #5 with Dominique "Domo" Woodham "All About Fire"
summary:
Domo Contacted me on social media, which lead to emails, which lead to this wonderful conversation about fires both wild and prescribed, grazing management and the need for more cultural acceptance of fire.
